query:
SELECT table_name, column_name
            FROM information_schema.columns
            WHERE table_schema = 'public'
            AND (
                column_name ILIKE '%password%' OR
                column_name ILIKE '%secret%' OR
                column_name ILIKE '%token%' OR
                column_name ILIKE '%key%'
            )
            AND data_type = 'text'
